column5: Looking to stay in Sioux Narrows this summer and came across Crawford Camp. I'm looking for a place for the wife and myself. Has anybody stayed there lately? Any other suggestions will be greatly appreciated. Thanks Paul
You will not find a better place than Tomahawk Resort . The Kast Family run a super place and their accommodations and equipment are A-1 . We have stayed with them many times .
Stayed at Crawfords about 30 years ago it was ok . Moved next door to motlongs rod and reel , nice cabins and beach and you can walk across the bridge to town and its half the price of tomahawk .

Stay at the Tomahawk exclusively. Have been to the others in the area and there is a major difference for the price difference. We have been going to the area for 30+ years and will only stay with the Kast family.
